verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> and Psalm<WH4210> for the sons<WH1121> of Korah.<WH7141> Great<WH1419> is the LORD,<WH3068> and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984> in the city<WH5892> of our God,<WH430> in the mountain<WH2022> of his holiness.<WH6944>

Beautiful <WH3303> for situation,<WH5131> the joy<WH4885> of the whole<WH3605> earth,<WH776> is mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> on the sides<WH3411> of the north,<WH6828> the city<WH7151> of the great<WH7227> King.<WH4428>
God <WH430> is known<WH3045> in her palaces<WH759> for a refuge.<WH4869>
For, <WH3588> lo,<WH2009> the kings<WH4428> were assembled,<WH3259> they passed by<WH5674> together.<WH3162>
They <WH1992> saw<WH7200> it, and so<WH3651> they marveled;<WH8539> they were troubled,<WH926> and hasted away.<WH2648>
Fear <WH7461> took hold upon<WH270> them there,<WH8033> and pain,<WH2427> as of a woman in travail.<WH3205>
Thou breakest<WH7665> the ships<WH591> of Tarshish<WH8659> with an east<WH6921> wind.<WH7307>

As <WH834> we have heard,<WH8085> so<WH3651> have we seen<WH7200> in the city<WH5892> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> in the city<WH5892> of our God:<WH430> God<WH430> will establish<WH3559> it forever.<WH5704> <WH5769> Selah.<WH5542>
We have thought<WH1819> of thy lovingkindness,<WH2617> O God,<WH430> in the midst<WH7130> of thy temple.<WH1964>
According to thy name,<WH8034> O God,<WH430> so<WH3651> is thy praise<WH8416> unto<WH5921> the ends<WH7099> of the earth:<WH776> thy right hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of righteousness.<WH6664>
Let mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> rejoice,<WH8055> let the daughters<WH1323> of Judah<WH3063> be glad,<WH1523> because of<WH4616> thy judgments.<WH4941>
Walk about<WH5437> Zion,<WH6726> and go round about<WH5362> her: tell<WH5608> the towers<WH4026> thereof.
Mark ye well<WH7896> <WH3820> her bulwarks,<WH2430> consider<WH6448> her palaces;<WH759> that<WH4616> ye may tell<WH5608> it to the generation<WH1755> following.<WH314>
For <WH3588> this<WH2088> God<WH430> is our God<WH430> forever<WH5769> and ever:<WH5703> he<WH1931> will be our guide<WH5090> even unto<WH5921> death.<WH4191>
